sec.title: Conflicts of Interest
sec.p: Jouni Jaakkola and Suvi Juntunen report that this study was partly funded by Finnish Cultural Foundation (Arahat project). The summary of the main findings in this article will be made available for the Saami communities in North Saami language. Klemetti N채kk채l채j채rvi reports grants and personal fees from Wihuri foundation, during the conduct of the study.

sec.title: Human and Animal Rights
sec.p: This article does not contain any studies with human or animal subjects performed by any of the authors.
